_comment: Agent definitions for multi-agent orchestration harness
_maps_to: Warrior build at Commander trust level

orchestrator.description: Coordinates specialized agents to build applications autonomously
orchestrator.game_parallel: The orchestrator IS the game engine running at Warrior Commander trust

linear.description: Manages Linear issues, project status, and session handoff
use_for: Maintain META issue for session tracking

coding.description: Writes and tests code with browser verification
use_for: Implement features based on Linear issues
critical_rules: Screenshot evidence REQUIRED for every task
No temporary files in project root

github.description: Handles Git commits, branches, and GitHub PRs

slack.description: Sends Slack notifications for progress updates

arcade.description: Unified gateway for Linear, GitHub, Slack
arcade.note: Uses tool discovery - not all 91 tools dumped into context

context_passing.rule: Agents don't share memory - orchestrator must pass ALL context explicitly
context_passing.anti_pattern: Ask coding agent to check Linear
context_passing.correct_pattern: Get from Linear agent, pass full context to coding agent

verification_gate.rule: Test existing features BEFORE new work
verification_gate.on_fail: Fix regression first, do NOT proceed

screenshot_evidence.rule: No Done status without screenshot proof
